DOC.brief_title: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Endpoints Study
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation Novel Endpoints Subjects Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled Study Treatment Fluticasone Propionate/Salmeterol 500/50mcg combination ( FSC 500/50 ) individual component , Fluticasone Propionate 500mcg ( FP500 ) Salmeterol 50mcg ( SAL 50 )
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis COPD Current exsmoker least 10 pack year Exclusion criterion : Diagnosis asthma Active respiratory disorder COPD Evidence clinically significant uncontrolled nonpulmonary disease Carcinoma complete remission last 5 year Lung volume reduction surgery previous 12 month Nocturnal positive pressure sleep apnea Other inclusion exclusion criterion evaluate first study visit .
